title: Can anyone share the latest syllabus pdf for cse and cse(AI/ML) ?

comments.body:
CSE AIML branch is the new rebranded MIDS specialisation that existed for CS (the other specialisations were cybersecurity and systems). It was turned into a full fledged branch because it was the perfect cash cow for PES to trick people riding the hype to take up the branch. It was introduced only last year, so no official syllabus exists.

If you want to see the syllabus for MIDS for which it was based on, only the electives in third year are different. You can join the main PESU Discord and access the latest syllabus that was followed by the most recent batch that finished third year.
I've mentioned it before but it's a new branch. From whatever we know it should be mostly the same. Now whether PES changes things is unknown, but most of third year will change.
